text: [Music]
the following report contains some
graphic images the me travel art of this
prominent anti-government activist he
remains in hospital there had been a lot
of concern amongst the demonstrators
about this individual because he went
missing over a week ago he says he was
dumped in a forest not far from a
village on the outskirts of Kiev last
night and the videos we've seen of him
he has been badly beat and he says he
was tortured but he was cut with knives
that he was beaten up he was blindfolded
throughout this ordeal and indeed he's
had a part of his ear cut off as well
and as you said he was hung up by his
wrists for a substantial period of time
as well he's in hospital in intensive
care being cared for at the moment he
actually was the leader of a group known
as Otto Maidan which was a part of the
protest group here who organized convoys
to drive around the outskirts of
Independence Square which is behind me
and they were trying to protect the
square make sure that police didn't try
to get across the barricades also that
drive convoys of vehicles up to
government ministers houses and protests
including outside the home of President
Yanukovych so he was a well-known
individual he's just one of a number of
activists who have been taken off the
streets and gone missing indeed last
week a number of activists had gone
missing
one was found in a forest on the
outskirts of Kiev and he had died and he
bared the hallmarks of torture as well
so there is suspicion by the
demonstrators out there that there was
some kind of group they don't know who
it is who is targeting some of their
main activists
